acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was loaned to the Library by the Virginia Philosophical Association through Peter Heath of the Philosophy Department, University of Virginia, on July 11, 1989.

processinfo.head: Funding Note
processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These 217 items, 1961-1989, pertaining to the Virginia Philosophical Associationinclude correspondence, memoranda, minutes, programs, membership lists, and related papers. One group of papers, 1961-1988, was compiled by P. Allan Carlsson, Professor of Philosophy and Associate Dean for Administration at Virginia Military Institute; the other group, 1976-1989, was compiled by Peter Heath, Professor of Philosophy at the University of Virginia.
